---
title: Example plots
output: powerpoint_presentation
classoption: landscape
---

Print these plots before the workshop

\clearpage

```{r echo=F, include=F}
library(tidyverse)
studyhabits <- read_csv('https://benwhalley.github.io/rmip/data/studyhabitsandgrades.csv')
set.seed(1234)
```

```{r, results="asis", echo=F, message=F, warning=F}
for (i in 1:16) {
  p <- studyhabits %>%
    sample_n(10) %>%
    ggplot(aes(work_hours, grade)) + geom_point() + ggtitle(paste("Group", i))
  pander::pandoc.p('')
  print(p, dpi=150)
  pander::pandoc.p('')
    

}

```
